mapper.select: /* com.biz.framework.mapper.pages.ApplypaymentMapper.createSettlementSeq */ SELECT CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '-', LPAD(IFNULL(COUNT(CONFIRM_SEQ), 0) + 1, '4', '0')) AS CONFIRM_SEQ FROM SETTLEMENTMST WHERE CONFIRM_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.insert: /* com.biz.framework.mapper.pages.ApplypaymentapprmngMapper.confirmApplypayment */ INSERT SETTLEMENTMST ( CONFIRM_SEQ, SETTLEMENT_SEQ, USER_ID, CONFIRM_AMT, CONFIRM_MILEAGE, CONFIRM_RATE_AMT, CONFIRM_DATE, CONFIRM_IND, TAX_IND, PAY_YM, ATCH_ID, REMARK ) VALUES ( #{confirmSeq}, #{settlementSeq}, #{userId}, #{confirmAmt}, #{confirmMileage}, #{confirmRateAmt}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), 'Y', #{taxInd}, #{payYm}, #{atchId}, #{remark} )
mapper.select: /* com.biz.framework.mapper.pages.ApplypaymentapprmngMapper.findSettlement */ SELECT SETTLEMENT_SEQ, USER_ID, CUST_ID, PROD_ID, INCENTIVE_RATE FROM SETTLEMENT WHERE SETTLEMENT_SEQ = #{settlementSeq}
